translations.Soy un apasionado desarrollador Full-sta: I am a passionate Full-stack JavaScript developer with over 5 years of experience in creating efficient web applications and robust systems. My journey in the world of technology began at a young age, always curious about computers and how they work.
translations.Aunque comencé mi formación universitari: Although I started my university education in systems, much of my knowledge has been acquired self-taught, which has allowed me to quickly adapt to new technologies and frameworks like Qwik, React, and Vue.
translations.Creo firmemente que vivimos en una era ú: I firmly believe that we live in a unique era where global connectivity allows us to unite and collaborate like never before. My mission is to leverage this connectivity to create systems that foster unity and progress, increasing the positive vibration of our planet.
translations.Nazco en Montevideo, Uruguay: I was born in Montevideo, Uruguay
translations.Nos mudamos a Buenos Aires, Argentina: We moved to Buenos Aires, Argentina
translations.Me regalan mi primera computadora Pentiu: I received my first Pentium IV computer with 4GB of disk and 256MB of RAM.
translations.Instalo un emulador de SEGA con mas 500: I installed a SEGA emulator with over 500 games and played them all.
translations.Conecto la computadora por dial-up al te: I connected the computer via dial-up to the home phone and discovered the Internet. I searched for song lyrics and game cheats.
translations.Descubro Internet por ADSL. Aprendo a de: I discovered Internet via ADSL. I learned to download mp3 music through P2P (Ares) and burn blank CDs.
translations.Me regalan mi primer impresora y la uso: I received my first printer and used it to print photos and CD covers with songs.
translations.Termino la primaria. En aquel tiempo 9°: I finished primary school. At that time, 9th grade.
translations.Termino la secundaria con orientación a: I finished high school with a focus on EGEOR (Economics and Management of Organizations).
translations.Empiezo la carrera de Licenciatura en Si: I started studying for a Bachelor's degree in Systems at UNLP.
translations.Me regalan mi primera notebook (Lenovo G: I received my first laptop (Lenovo G470).
translations.Dejo de comer animales y adopto una diet: I stop eating animals and adopt a vegan diet.
translations.Me independizo y trabajo un tiempo como: I become independent and work for a while as a kitchen assistant, waiter, gas station attendant, and pharmacy cashier.
✈️ I travel by plane for the first time.
translations.Me registro en $1 y empiezo a estudiar p: I register on $1 and start studying programming self-taught.
translations.Comienzo a trabajar presencial en $1 com: I start working in person at $1 as a React programmer for a $2 system.
translations.Llega la pandemia y empiezo a trabajar r: The pandemic arrives and I start working remotely.
translations.Compro mi notebook Asus Vivobook Ryzen 7: I buy my Asus Vivobook Ryzen 7 4700u laptop.
Daiana and I start living together. 🐶 $1 comes with us.
translations.I am a full-stack web developer with exp: I am a full-stack web developer with experience in modern technologies such as Qwik.
translations.I develop software for build web apps fo: I develop software to build Web Apps focused on performance and user experience.
translations.I'm a Full-stack Developer from 🇺🇾 Urugu: I'm a Full-stack Web Developer from 🇺🇾 Uruguay living in 🇦🇷 Argentina.
translations.Fuera del desarrollo web, disfruto de ac: Outside of web development, I enjoy outdoor activities such as biking, swimming and lifting weights at the gym. In addition, I love reading books by inspirational authors such as Napoleon Hill, Steven Covey, Kiyosaki, Harv Eker and Eckhart Tolle, which motivate me to grow both personally and professionally.
translations.I'm a Full-stack JavaScript Developer fr: I'm a Full-Stack Web Developer from 🇺🇾 Uruguay living in 🇦🇷 Argentina.
translations.Transformando ideas en realidades digita: Transforming ideas into digital realities with JavaScript.
translations.Construyendo el futuro de la web con cad: Building the future of the web with every line of code.
translations.Optimización y eficiencia en cada proyec: Optimization and efficiency in every web development project.
translations.Integrando tecnologías modernas para exp: Integrating modern technologies for optimal digital experiences.
translations.Impulsando la creatividad con código lim: Boosting creativity with clean and functional code.
translations.Conectando ideas con implementaciones té: Connecting ideas with effective technical implementations.
translations.Facilitando el crecimiento digital media: Facilitating digital growth through full-stack development.
translations.Diseñando interfaces intuitivas con back: Designing intuitive interfaces with scalable backends.
translations.Transformando desafíos en oportunidades: Transforming challenges into opportunities through code.
translations.Creando sistemas inteligentes para una w: Creating intelligent systems for a more efficient web.
translations.y empiezo a estudiar programación de for: and I start studying programming self-taught.
translations.Comienzo a trabajar presencial en: I start working in person at
translations.como programador React para un sistema d: as a React programmer for a system of
Daiana and I start living together.
translations.Soy un desarrollador Full-stack JavaScri: I am a Full-stack JavaScript developer with over 5 years of experience in creating modern, efficient, and scalable web applications. My passion for technology was born at a young age, always fascinated by solving problems and understanding how systems work.
translations.Aunque inicié mis estudios en sistemas,: Although I began my studies in systems, much of my learning has been self-taught, which has allowed me to quickly adapt to new tools and frameworks like Qwik, React, and Vue, seizing every opportunity to continue evolving as a professional.
translations.Más allá del desarrollo, disfruto de act: Beyond development, I enjoy outdoor activities like cycling, swimming, and physical training, which help me maintain a balance between personal and professional life. I am constantly motivated by the pursuit of new ideas and challenges that contribute to my overall growth.
translations.Desarrollo software para construir aplic: I develop software to build web applications focused on performance and user experience.
translations.Soy un Desarrollador JavaScript Full-sta: I am a Full-stack JavaScript Developer from 🇺🇾 Uruguay living in 🇦🇷 Argentina.
